field_0.descript: You are standing in the middle of a wide open field. In the west the silhouette of an enormeous castle cuts the sky. North of you is a birch grove. A dark forest reaches to the east.
field_0.sdescript: You are in a wide open field.

field_1.descript: You are in a wide rocky pit. An aisle leads upwards to the north.

errors.south: The slope is too steep here.
errors.west: The slope is too steep here.
errors.east: The slope is too steep here.

dir_descriptions.up: You spread your wings and start to fly.

field_1.hint: here's my special hint for you.
